text: The 2010 BMW PGA Championship was the 56th edition of the BMW PGA Championship, an annual professional golf tournament on the European Tour. It was held 20–23 May at the West Course of Wentworth Club in Virginia Water, Surrey, England, a suburb southwest of London. Englishman Simon Khan won his first BMW PGA Championship with a one stroke victory over Swede Fredrik Andersson Hed and fellow Englishman Luke Donald. == Course layout == == Past champions in the
